pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

sentences.english: Real-word spell checking is a long-existing problem in the natural language processing field.
sentences.chinese: 真詞錯誤拼寫校對是自然語言處理領域中的一個難題。

sentences.english: Another issue is that natural language is often very ambiguous.
sentences.chinese: 另一個問題是自然語言常常非常不明確。

sentences.english: Double-object structure is one of basic structures in natural languages.
sentences.chinese: 雙賓結構是自然語言中普遍存在的最基本的結構之一。

sentences.english: The double object construction is pervasive in English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 雙賓結構是自然語言中普遍存在的最基本的結構之一。

sentences.english: CQAES (Chinese Question-Answer Experimental System) is a chinese natural language understanding system.
sentences.chinese: 是一箇中文自然語言理解問答系統。

sentences.english: Word sense disambiguation is one of the difficult problems and a key point in natural language processing.
sentences.chinese: 詞義排岐是自然語言處理的重點和難點問題之一。

sentences.english: The previous research focuses on natural-language spatial relations.
sentences.chinese: 目前的相關研究主要集中於自然語言空間關係。

sentences.english: Ability to communicate across team borders is limited by the ambiguity of natural language.
sentences.chinese: 跨團隊交流的能力受到自然語言的多義性的限制。

sentences.english: It is, however, necessary to support proper representation of natural-language documents.
sentences.chinese: 然而，對自然語言文檔的正確支持是非常必要的。

sentences.english: The way humans normally communicate is through natural language.
sentences.chinese: 人類通常是通過自然語言進行溝通的。

sentences.english: Just like with a natural language, we're going to separate out syntax versus semantics.
sentences.chinese: 就像自然語言一樣，我們要去把語法和語義區分開來。

sentences.english: Rule-based method and statistics-based method have advantages and disadvantages respectively in natural language processing.
sentences.chinese: 在自然語言處理中，規則方法和統計方法各有優缺點。

sentences.english: The server is preparing to perform a natural-language full-text search.
sentences.chinese: 服務器正在準備進行自然語言全文檢索。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a method of multi-document summarization used in TDT.
sentences.chinese: 多文檔摘要是自然語言理解領域的一個重要課題。

sentences.english: New representations must be easy to translate to and from natural language.
sentences.chinese: 新的表示形式必須能夠方便地與自然語言進行轉換。

sentences.english: Rhetorics is a control of natural language.
sentences.chinese: 修辭就是對自然語言實行控制。

definition: variant of 戰略伙伴|战略伙伴[zhan4 lu:e4 huo3 ban4]
network router/gateway (to Internet or between networks)

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
